verses.verse: And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and for their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> and for their <S%H8199>judges,<s%> and for their <S%H7860>officers;<s%> and they presented <S%H3320>themselves<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> Your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H5104>flood<s%> in old <S%H4480>time,<s%> <S%H5769><s%> even <S%H8646>Terah,<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> and the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H5152>Nachor:<s%> and they <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods.<s%>

And I <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> from the other <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H5676><s%> of the <S%H5104>flood,<s%> and <S%H1980>led<s%> him throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac.<s%>

And I <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and <S%H6215>Esau:<s%> and I <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it; but <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and his <S%H1121>children<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

I <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> also and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and I <S%H5062>plagued<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> according to that <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> them: and <S%H310>afterward<s%> I brought you <S%H3318>out.<s%> <S%H853><s%>

And I brought your fathers <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1><s%> of <S%H4480>Egypt:<s%> <S%H4714><s%> and ye <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> with <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> unto the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

And when they <S%H6817>cried<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> he <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H3990>darkness<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> you and the <S%H4713>Egyptians,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them, and <S%H3680>covered<s%> them; and your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>what<s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> and ye <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> a <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>season.<s%>

And I <S%H935>brought<s%> you <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> which <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan;<s%> and they <S%H3898>fought<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> you: and I <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> that ye might <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H776>land;<s%> and I <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you.

Then <S%H1111>Balak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6834>Zippor,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H3898>warred<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> to <S%H7043>curse<s%> you:

But I <S%H14>would<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto <S%H1109>Balaam;<s%> therefore he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H1288><s%> you still: so I <S%H5337>delivered<s%> you out of his <S%H4480>hand.<s%> <S%H3027><s%>

And ye went <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3405>Jericho:<s%> and the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> against you, the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and the <S%H1622>Girgashites,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusites;<s%> and I <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And I <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6880>hornet<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, which drove them <S%H1644>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, even the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites;<s%> but <S%H3808>not<s%> with thy <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> with thy <S%H7198>bow.<s%>

And I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you a <S%H776>land<s%> for <S%H834>which<s%> ye did <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3021>labor,<s%> and <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> and ye <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in them; of the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> and <S%H2132>oliveyards<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye <S%H5193>planted<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> do <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H398>eat.<s%>

Now <S%H6258>therefore<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> him in <S%H8549>sincerity<s%> and in <S%H571>truth:<s%> and put <S%H5493>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H5104>flood,<s%> and in <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H853>ye<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> it seem <S%H7489>evil<s%> unto <S%H5869>you<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H977>choose<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4310>whom<s%> ye will <S%H5647>serve;<s%> <S%H518>whether<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H5104>flood,<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> in whose <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H3427>dwell:<s%> but as for <S%H595>me<s%> and my <S%H1004>house,<s%> we will <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> God <S%H2486>forbid<s%> that we should <S%H4480>forsake<s%> <S%H5800><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods;<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> it is that <S%H5927>brought<s%> us up and our <S%H1>fathers<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of <S%H5650>bondage,<s%> and <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H226>signs<s%> in our <S%H5869>sight,<s%> and <S%H8104>preserved<s%> us in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> we <S%H1980>went,<s%> and among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7130>through<s%> whom we passed: <S%H5674><s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> drove <S%H1644>out<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H853>us<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> even the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> which <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H776>land:<s%> therefore will <S%H587>we<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is our <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> Ye <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is a <S%H7072>jealous<s%> <S%H410>God;<s%> he will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5375>forgive<s%> your <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> nor your <S%H2403>sins.<s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> ye <S%H5800>forsake<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> then he will <S%H7725>turn<s%> and do you <S%H7489>hurt,<s%> and <S%H3615>consume<s%> you, <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath done you <S%H3190>good.<s%>
And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H3808>Nay;<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> we will <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H859>Ye<s%> are <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> against yourselves <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> have <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H853>you<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> him. And they <S%H559>said,<s%> We are <S%H5707>witnesses.<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore put <S%H5493>away,<s%> said he, <S%H853>the<s%> <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H7130>among<s%> you, and <S%H5186>incline<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H853><s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> will we <S%H5647>serve,<s%> and his <S%H6963>voice<s%> will we <S%H8085>obey.<s%>

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> them a <S%H2706>statute<s%> and an <S%H4941>ordinance<s%> in <S%H7927>Shechem.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3789>wrote<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stone,<s%> and set it <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> an <S%H427>oak,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was by the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H5713>witness<s%> unto us; <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> hath <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H5973>unto<s%> us: it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> therefore a <S%H5713>witness<s%> unto you, <S%H6435>lest<s%> ye <S%H3584>deny<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H853>let<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>depart,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> unto his <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things,<s%> that <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> being a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> years <S%H8141>old.<s%>

And they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H1366>border<s%> of his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> in <S%H8556>Timnathserah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> on the north <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6828><s%> of the <S%H2022>hill<s%> of <S%H1608>Gaash.<s%>

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H748>overlived<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H310><s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and <S%H834>which<s%> had <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he had <S%H6213>done<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> brought <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4480>Egypt,<s%> <S%H4714><s%> <S%H6912>buried<s%> they in <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> in a <S%H2513>parcel<s%> of <S%H7704>ground<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7069>bought<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H7928>Shechem<s%> for a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> pieces of <S%H7192>silver:<s%> and it <S%H1961>became<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph.<s%>

And <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H4191>died;<s%> and they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in a <S%H1389>hill<s%> that pertained to <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H5414>given<s%> him in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%>
